title: Secondo uno studio dell'università di Urbino l'algoritmo di Facebook ora punisce la politica ufficiale e premia gli estremisti antieuropei. Pd e FdI verso una legge bipartisan sulle piattaforme
snippet: A study by the University of Urbino, authored by Professor Fabio Giglietto, analyzes the effects of Meta's algorithmic choices on the distribution and visibility of political content on Facebook. The study highlights significant transparency deficits, noting that the algorithmic suppression appears less effective against the extremists it intended to target. The researchers analyzed over 2.5 million Facebook posts published between 2021 and 2025.
description: This article from open.online discusses a study by the University of Urbino, authored by Professor Fabio Giglietto, which analyzes the impact of Facebook's algorithm on political content, finding it ineffective against extremists and highlighting transparency issues.
